description: The '''Legendary Shack Shakers''' (originally '''Those''' or '''Th' ''') are an [[United States|American]] rock band from [[Murray, Kentucky]] that was formed in 1995 by [[J.D. Wilkes]]. The original line-up formed the band out of a shared interest in [[rockabilly]], [[blues]] and [[Western swing]]. Subsequently, the band gained prominence in the [[alternative country]] scene with a sound that encompassed rockabilly, blues, country and [[punk rock]] and a lyrical focus on [[Southern Gothic]] themes. Over time, the band's sound shifted to emphasize country music.
